author: COMSOL
description:
This example demonstrates how a nonlinear equation system can be set up to solve for the eigenfrequencies of a symmetric laser cavity. The example uses the bidirectional formulation of the Electromagnetic Waves, Beam Envelopes physics interface.

The computed eigenfrequencies are verified to values from analytical expressions.
label: symmetric_laser_cavity.mph
name: root

title: Transverse Modes for a Symmetric Laser Cavity
